name: Track Roll
description:
A puzzle game you can win through skill, luck, or both! Move the cube along the track, and roll at any time for a chance to break the level!

Rules:

  • Colored Tiles and Colored Cube Sides must always match
  • Can Flip Cube on Neutral (gray) Tiles to change rotation
  • Can Roll to randomize orientation on any tile

Controls:

MOVE: WASD or Arrow Keys

  • Move the Cube along the Track

FLIP: Space followed by WASD or Arrow Keys

  • While on Neutral (Gray) Tile, Rotate Cube by one side in a single direction

ROLL: Shift + Space

  • On any Tile, Roll the Cube to Randomize it's orientation

Game by Noah Reece

Sound Engineering by David Magadan
